name: Conditional Workflow
 
on:
  push:
    paths:
      - 'functions/**'
      - 'layers/**'
 
jobs:
  check_changes:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    outputs:
      functions_changed: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.functions }}
      layers_changed: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.layers }}
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3
 
      - name: Check for changes in folders
        id: filter
        uses: dorny/paths-filter@v2
        with:
          filters: |
            functions:
              - 'functions/**'
            layers:
              - 'layers/**'
 
  light:
    needs: check_changes
    if: ${{ needs.check_changes.outputs.layers_changed == 'true' }}
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Run light.yaml
        run: echo "Running light.yaml logic here"  # Replace with actual logic
 
  deploy:
    needs: check_changes
    if: ${{ needs.check_changes.outputs.folder1_changed == 'true' }}
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Wait for light if needed
        if: ${{ needs.check_changes.outputs.layers_changed == 'true' }}
        run: echo "Waiting for light (was triggered)"
 
      - name: Run deploy.yaml
        run: echo "Running deploy.yaml"
